mapper.select: select ur.ur_parking_lot_location , ur.ur_parking_lot_name , ccw.cc_hp , ur.start_time ,ur.ur_consumption_time from use_record ur, coalition_company_web ccw where ur.ur_parking_lot_location = ccw.cc_building_address order by ur.start_time

select ur.ur_parking_lot_location , ur.ur_parking_lot_name , ccw.cc_hp , ur.start_time ,ur.ur_consumption_time from use_record ur, coalition_company_web ccw where ur.ur_parking_lot_location = ccw.cc_building_address order by ur.start_time
select mem_id, mem_name, mem_point, mem_pw, mem_phone, mem_birthday, mem_uniqueness ,mem_email, mem_grade, mem_join_date from member where mem_id = #{mem_id}
